match.title: 1st ODI
match.statusText: Bangladesh won by 6 wickets (with 125 balls remaining)

notes: Aftab Ahmed 50 off 42 balls in 51 mins, 9x4, 1x6

milestones.description: Hamilton and Fraser Watts's 45-run partnership is SCOT's highest for the 3rd wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 15 between Ian Philip and Mike Smith
Colin Smith and Glenn Rogers's 39-run partnership is SCOT's highest for the 8th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 28 between John Blain and Craig Wright
Paul Hoffmann and Ross Lyons's 23-run partnership is SCOT's highest for the 10th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 13 between Paul Hoffmann and Ross Lyons
This is the lowest match aggregate (307) involving teams Bangladesh & Scotland in ODIs

stories.title: Bangladesh thrash Scotland in first ODI
stories.subTitle: Bangladesh v Scotland, Ist ODI, Chittagong
stories.summary: Bangladesh won the first of two ODIs against Scotland, cruising to a six-wicket win with more than 20 overs to spare after bowling the Scots out for 153 at Chittagong

25.title: 5th ODI
25.statusText: Bangladesh won by 3 wickets (with 6 balls remaining)
